alert.note: Alert for Northwest Fayette; Northwest Nicholas; Northwest Raleigh; Southeast Fayette; Southeast Nicholas; Southeast Raleigh (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 09 at 10:26AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Virginia, including the following county, Buchanan. Portions of West Virginia, including the following counties, McDowell, Northwest Fayette, Northwest Nicholas, Northwest Raleigh, Southeast Fayette, Southeast Nicholas, Southeast Raleigh and Wyoming. * WHEN...From 2 PM EDT this afternoon through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Fayette; Northwest Nicholas; Northwest Raleigh; Southeast Fayette; Southeast Nicholas; Southeast Raleigh
